text:
@ChrisReason7 Are you fucking serious. It's called Covid19 you twit. It's the same virus that every state in Australia has. The same one that arrived in Sydney with the Ruby Princess and killed at least 22 people across the country. The same one that killed 14 people in one aged care in 
NSW.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
